de.nec.nle.siafu.model

Interface Trackable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Agent, Place

    public interface Trackable
    An interface for objects that can be tracked on the simulation, that is, objects that have a position and can be marked with a Marker.
    Author:
    Miquel Martin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlatData getContext(String ctxName)
      Retrieve context information from the trackable.
      String getName()
      Get the name of the trackable.
      Position getPos()
      Get the position of the trackable.
      boolean isVisible()
      Check if the trackable is visible.
      Publishable set(String key, Publishable value)
      Set an info field in the trackable to the given value.
      void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Set the visibility of the trackable.

    • Method Detail

      • getPos

        Position getPos()
        Get the position of the trackable.
        Returns:
        the position

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the name of the trackable.
        Returns:
        the name

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Check if the trackable is visible.
        Returns:
        true if it is visible

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Set the visibility of the trackable.
        Parameters:
        visible - true to make it visible, false to make it disappear.

      • getContext

        FlatData getContext(String ctxName)
                    throws UnknownContextException
        Retrieve context information from the trackable.
        Parameters:
        ctxName - the context to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the flattened data value for the context variable
        Throws:
        UnknownContextException - if the context variable is unknown for this trackable

      • set

        Publishable set(String key,
              Publishable value)
        Set an info field in the trackable to the given value.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to set
        value - the value for the key
        Returns:
        the old value, if the key already existed, or null otherwise
